UNESCO AGH Chair Celebrates World Water Day 2025
On World Water Day 2025, the UNESCO AGH Chair joins the global call for  glacier preservation. As glaciers melt at an alarming rate, water cycles  become unpredictable, threatening communities, ecosystems, and water  security. This year’s theme highlights the urgent need to reduce carbon  emissions and manage meltwater sustainably. At AGH University, we are  committed to research and education that support climate action and  water resource protection. Together, we can safeguard our frozen water  reserves for future generations. Join us in raising awareness and taking  action for a sustainable water future.
